original_text: Any uncircumcised male who is not circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin shall be cut off from his people; he has broken my covenant.”
korean_text: 할례를 받지 아니한 남자 곧 그 포피를 베지 아니한 자는 백성 중에서 끊어지리니 그가 내 언약을 배반하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: who is not circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 포피 살에 할례를 받지 않으면

sentences.original_text: shall be cut off from his people
